question: Which actor has been chosen as goodwill ambassador for Maharashtra polls?
explanation: Actor Madhuri Dixit has been chosen as goodwill ambassador by the Chief Electoral Office (CEO) in Maharashtra to create awareness among people about the importance of voting. The State Assembly polls are scheduled for October 21 and results will be declared on October 24. She will be seen in a video titled \'Let\'s Vote\" speaking about the democratic process and role of voters in the development of the country.
